attributes.title: How Unclutching Can Save Us During This New Pralaya (Great Period of Destruction)
attributes.description:
12 JUL 2020 - NITHYANANDA SATSANG

*DIRECT MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA FROM KAILASA:

*WHAT IS HAPPENING AS ON NOW ON PLANET EARTH IS “PRALAYA”. IT IS NOT PHYSICAL DELUGE AS IT USED TO HAPPEN EARLIER. IT IS NOT FLOOD OF WATER LIKE TSUNAMI OR HUGE WAVES FROM OCEAN AND OCEAN ENTERING INTO THE LAND. IT IS NOT FLOOD OF WATER, IT IS FLOOD OF CONSCIOUSNESS. 

*DUE TO HUGE CONSCIOUSNESS ENTERING, BECAUSE OF THE TIME FOR SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH, THIS CONSCIOUS FLOOD, ALL THE DELUSION-BASED SYSTEMS ARE JUST GOING TO MELT DOWN.

*HUMAN BEINGS CAN’T HANDLE LIFE WITHOUT DELUSIONS, LIES, FALSE PROMISES, HOPES, FALSE INSECURITIES, FALSE IDENTITIES. BUT NOW, BECAUSE THE DELUSION IS MELTING DOWN, MANY OF YOUR FALSE HOPES ARE MELTING DOWN. MANY OF YOUR FALSE SECURITY FEELING IS MELTING DOWN. MANY OF THE SOCIAL CONTRACTS BETWEEN YOU AND THE SOCIETY, YOU AND THE NATION, YOU AND THE WORLD IS ALL MELTING DOWN.

*WHEN ALL YOUR LIES ARE FORCIBLY REMOVED FROM YOU, ALL YOUR FALSEHOODS, HOPES AND FALSE HOPES, DREAMS, ARE FORCIBLY REMOVED FROM YOU, WHEN YOU ARE REALLY REALLY MADE TO SEE EVERYTHING AROUND YOU IS MELTING DOWN, YOU FEEL LIKE REALLY YOU ARE MELTING DOWN. THAT IS WHAT I AM SAYING IS PANDEMIC FATIGUE. IT IS NOT JUST AT THE PHYSICAL LEVEL. PEOPLE ARE SEEING IN FRONT OF THEIR EYES THAT EVERYTHING IS JUST MELTING DOWN. 

*USUALLY THE WORLD CHANGES MAY BE IN 50 YEARS. PEOPLE AROUND 60-70 YEARS THINK, “50 YEARS BACK, WORLD WAS LIKE THAT. NOW IT IS LIKE THIS.” BUT NOW, THIS TIME, WHATEVER CHANGES HAPPEN IN 50 YEARS - GOOD, BAD, RIGHT, WRONG - IS HAPPENING IN 50 DAYS! MULTIPLE THINGS YOU THOUGHT AS ETERNAL IS JUST MELTING DOWN.

*IN MY VISION I SAW VERY CLEARLY WHAT IS COMING. I WANT TO PUT ON RECORD ONCE MORE IN PUBLIC SATSANG: I KNOW THIS GREAT PRALAYA IS GOING TO HAPPEN IN 2020. 

*FROM 2012 I STARTED PREPARING PEOPLE CONSCIOUSLY TO HAVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH; TO SEE THROUGH THIS PRALAYA AND HELP THE HUMANITY HAVE A SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH. 

*UNFORTUNATELY HUMANITY DID NOT LET ME LIVE. NEITHER HUMAN BEINGS ALLOWED ME TO LIVE PEACEFULLY  NOR THEY ALLOWED ME EVEN TO LIVE. SO I WAS FORCED TO WITHDRAW FROM HUMANITY. 

*BUT I TELL YOU, I AM ABSOLUTELY COMMITTED TO GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO HUMANITY. WHOEVER IS READY TO LISTEN TO ME, I AM HERE TO PROTECT, SAVE. ANYONE WHO RECOGNISES MY IDENTITY AS PARAMASHIVA, WHO RECOGNISES ME, I AM HERE TO SAVE, PROTECT YOU FROM THIS GREAT PRALAYA AND GIVE YOU SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH. 

*I AM VERY CLEAR ON MY MISSION. FROM DECEMBER 2012, I AM TALKING ABOUT IT. I EVEN ANNOUNCED THIS FULL ONE YEAR I WANTED TO GO ON A PADA YATRA FROM KANYAKUMARI TO KASHMIR. IF I WAS ALLOWED TO DO THAT I WOULD HAVE REALLY HELPED HUMANITY. UNFORTUNATELY, NOT ONLY I WAS NOT ALLOWED TO DO PADA YATRA, I WAS NOT EVEN ALLOWED TO LIVE IN HUMANITY. I WAS FORCED TO WITHDRAW. BUT I WILL CONTINUE TO DO MY WORK. 

*PARAMASHIVA INSTRUCTED ME TO BUILD THIS CONSCIOUS SHIP TO PROTECT PEOPLE FROM FALLING INTO PANDEMIC FATIGUE, GETTING DESTROYED IN THIS PRALAYA. 

*I AM HERE WITH A CLEAR MESSAGE TO PROTECT, SAVE, TO GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO ANYONE WHO IS INTERESTED IN RECOGNISING ME AND READY TO LISTEN TO MY WORDS. 

*TO ALL MY DISCIPLES: PLEASE ADD MORE AND MORE  NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI AND UNCLUTCHING. 

*ENRICH YOURSELF FROM MORNING TO NIGHT WITH NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI. YOU WILL UNDERSTAND HOW TO JOYFULLY WILFULLY THINK. YOU WILL LEARN HOW YOU WILL BE UNCLUTCHED, AND THINKING WILL HAPPEN AS PER YOUR WILL AND ORDER. 

*ADD MORE UNCLUTCHING INSIDE YOUR LIFE AND ENREACH AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE AND TEACH THEM UNCLUTCHING. 

*EVERY INDIVIDUAL YOU TEACH UNCLUTCHING NOW, YOU ARE GOING TO SAVE HIM FROM THE PANDEMIC FATIGUE / EPIDEMIC FATIGUE, THE MENTAL BREAKDOWN, WHICH WILL BE INEVITABLE OTHERWISE.

*THERE ARE ONLY SPIRITUAL SOLUTIONS WHICH ARE GOING TO SAVE PEOPLE FROM THIS PANDEMIC FATIGUE.

*I AM NOT TALKING ABOUT THE PANDEMIC ITSELF NOW. THE PANDEMIC, CORONA, COVID 19 ITSELF IS NOT GOING TO KILL MANY PEOPLE. BUT THE PANDEMIC FATIGUE IS GOING TO DESTROY MANY PEOPLE’S LIFE. IT WILL BE MUCH WORSE THAN DEATH. DESTRUCTION IS MUCH WORSE THAN DEATH. HALF OF HUMANITY’S LIFE HAS STARTED GETTING AFFECTED. WHOLE HUMANITY’S LIFESTYLE IS GOING TO BE AFFECTED.

*THE AFTER EFFECTS OF CORONA COVID 19 IS GOING TO BE TOO MUCH.
